risk_warning: The financial products provided by Kerdant include Contracts for Difference (CFDs) and other complex financial instruments. Trading CFDs involves a high level of risk due to leverage, which can result in both significant gains and substantial losses. Consequently, CFDs may not be suitable for every investor, as there is a potential to lose your entire invested capital. It is crucial to only invest money that you can afford to lose. Before engaging in trading the complex financial products offered by Kerdant, please make sure you fully understand the associated risks.
cfd_offerings: CFDs on Stocks, ETFs, Commodities, Indices, Cryptocurrencies, and Forex.
brand_growth: Kerdant is one of the fastest-growing online trading brands in the world. Voted the best trading platform, we have now expanded our offerings to include CFDs on stocks, ETFs, and Forex trading.
company_growth: First founded in 2024, Kerdant has rapidly grown and now serves a diverse and expanding client base. Our platform is constantly evolving to ensure it is fast, accurate, and easy to use.
refined_offerings: We have refined our offerings and introduced numerous new products to provide our customers with the ultimate online trading experience and help them optimize their investment portfolios. Now, using our platform, our members can trade CFDs on currency pairs, stocks, commodities, cryptocurrencies, as well as ETFs.
platform_features: A multi-chart layout, technical analysis, historical quotes, and beyond. Everything you're looking for in a forex trading platform â€” available on MT5, accessible on the device of your choice.
company_overview: Kerdant was founded in 2024 and is headquartered in Saint Lucia. We offer a wide range of services, including CFDs on Stocks, ETFs, Commodities, Indices, Cryptocurrencies, and Forex, catering to both individual traders and institutional investors.
our_differentiators: Our differentiators include advanced technology, an intuitive back office never before seen in the forex world, and 24/7 customer support. Additionally, we provide instant withdrawals with no waiting time and offer 0 SPREADS to ensure the best trading experience for our clients.
our_commitment: At Kerdant, we are committed to providing a superior trading environment by combining innovation, efficiency, and exceptional customer service.
